attributes.action: limit domestic air travel by banning the shortest flights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All domestic flights that can be replaced by train journeys of 4 hours or less should be banned. With the issue of climate change, flights such as London-Manchester and Birmingham-Glasgow are inexcusable. The economy will also benefit from the extra slots that will become available at crowded London airports which could be utilised by more worthy flights.
